page.title: 13Bonfire Night
page.content: Every year Mum,Dad and two sisters go to a big bonfire in the village.My Dad does not like us to have fireworks because he thinks that they are dangerous so every year we take some with us to the bonfire.We give them to Mr.Smales who is the farmer who builds the bonfire. We have to pay Â£1 to be allowed in but we get hot dogs,beefburgers and cups of hot soup for this money. Bonfire night is held every year to celebrate the time that a man called Guido Fawkes tried to blow up the Houses of Parliament because he did not like the way in which the country was being governed.He was really a terrorist but nobody seems to think of him like that any more. Every year lots of people get hurt or burned on November the 5th.
